title: You Can Own a Portion of Boyd Cycling with Crowdfunding Investment
content:
Would you like to own a portion of a USA-based wheel manufacturing company? What if doing so would help the brand be a global force in the high-end bicycle wheel space? Boyd Cycling would like you to consider it.

Boyd Cycling has been building high-quality bicycle wheels since 2009. They’ve been designing their rims and hubs in-house since 2013. For the past 4 years, Boyd Cycling has been on-shoring its production into S. Carolina. They’ve worked hard to establish a cycling ecosystem and develop superior manufacturing methods.

With all of the new capabilities and vertical integration from manufacturing through end-user, Boyd is looking to expand from being a well-known USA wheel company to a global leader in the space.

That’s where you come in.

Why Invest in Boyd Cycling?

The following is straight from the Boyd Cycling investment pitch:

  • Experienced business leadership with a professional cycling background
  • 15 years of profitable operations as a premium brand in the cycling community
  • Leading the charge to onshore manufacturing, taking control of the supply chain, and creating high-paying local jobs
  • Acquired the world’s most advanced and automated carbon fiber rim capabilities with IP, patents, and manufacturing control.
  • Poised for explosive growth via vertical integration, expansion into global markets, plus OEM opportunities.
  • You can invest as little as $2,500 for an opportunity to be a part of our growth and worldwide expansion
  • Target +3x Equity Multiple on investment in 3-5 years, meaning when we sell you could more than triple your initial investment!

If you are interested, all of the details you need can be found here. But, time is running out… as of November 22, 2024, the crowdfunding closes.
